description: This file is a shell script used to manage the DHCPv6 server service, including starting, stopping, and configuring the service based on system events, configuration, and system properties.

methods.name: prepare_dhcpv6s_config
methods.description: Generates the DHCPv6 server configuration file based on system settings and event data.

methods.name: restore_dhcpv6s_duid
methods.description: Restores the DHCPv6 server's DUID from NVRAM if not already available.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes service parameters including system property retrieval.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the DHCPv6 server if enabled and the LAN is active.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the DHCPv6 server and saves its DUID to persistent storage.
